 2005-17432005-10-04,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisAppointment of GUY FOURNIER of Abbotsford, Quebec, to be Chairperson of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years.
